dcterms:creator: Maas et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset for document-level sentiment classification consisting of 25,000 positive and 25,000 negative movie reviews, divided into train and test sets with an average document length of 231 words.
dcterms:title: IMDb movie review dataset

dcterms:creator: Mikolov et al.
dcterms:description: A standard preprocessed version of the Penn Treebank dataset used for language modeling tasks.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank

dcterms:creator: Ranzato et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset for neural machine translation consisting of 209,772 sentence pairs from transcribed TED and TEDx presentations, focusing on character-level segmentation.
dcterms:title: IWSLT German-English spoken-domain translation dataset
